messages.subject: Re: unschooling conferences & intro
messages.msgSnippet: Kathryn, Believe me I ve heard plenty of that, but the biggest problem here is being so far from family.  Hubby and I grew up in Burlington, MA and all his
messages.messageBody:
Kathryn,
Believe me I've heard plenty of that, but the biggest problem here is
being so far from family. Hubby and I grew up in Burlington, MA and
all his family is still there. My family is pretty spread out and
mobile, so we thought it would be great to live near family we know
won't leave as soon as we get there. We really need a support system
because Ryan has autism and I want to surround ourselves with people
who would love to help out in a pinch. Also, the kids really want to
live in the snow! They both were born in CA and haven't seen the
snow too much. It's a good opportunity to get to know the cousins
and grandparents better. There have been other reasons for us to
move, but that's the main one. Besides, I really miss the Fall.
Last fall I was in a funk for about 3 months wishing for some kind of
weather change.

Hope we can meet some more unschoolers when we finally get to MA.
Kristin

> > We currently live in
> > Hawaii, but are hoping to move to Massachusetts by this fall.
>
> Kristin, welcome, and all that...but there is something terribly
wrong with
> this statement. And I live in Massachusetts.
> Kathryn

messages.subject: Re: unschooling conferences & intro

Kristin, welcome, and all that...but there is something terribly wrong with

Kathryn
